info.title: runGetMethod example
info.description: This is an API example for runGetMethod, a method to execute a get method on a smart contract in the TON blockchain.

address.description: The address of the smart contract

method.description: The name of the get method to execute

stack.description: The stack of parameters for the method

200.description: The result of executing the get method

exit_code.description: The exit code of the method execution

stack.description: The resulting stack after method execution

gas_used.description: The amount of gas used for the execution
